pages.text: Eat candy blocks by right clicking while crouching
pages.title: Gluttony

pages.text: Adds minor interactions with eating food
Consuming frostmint and purple soda will also cause a minor explosion
Purple soda applys slowness when in it
pages.title: Sticky Soda

pages.text: Overdrives your casted sugar staff abilities at the cost of a radiant essence held off-offhand
pages.title: Radiant Wrath

pages.text: Upgrades Sack Of Sating, adding new interactions and features
pages.title: Tuned Sating

pages.text:
Can drop items onto a dropped sack, 
 Can eat food that cant be picked up when in inventory, 
 Creates a jellybean when giving it a food with effects at the cost of 10 gelatin in inventory
Inflicts you with sugar crash after the effects of Sugar Rush, causing minor damage and slowness
pages.title: Sugar Crash

pages.text: Thrown Ice Cream Scoops inflict frost
pages.title: Iced Cream

pages.text: Allows the cooking of gelatin with a lit cauldron
pages.title: Breaking Candy

pages.text: To cook gelatin, drop in a dye of choice for the color, and a bone item,inside a heated cauldron,and simply wait
Assemble tasty ice creams (i love ice cream), Note that the Ice Cream sequence doesnt matter apart from the cone
pages.title: Ice Cream Cone

pages.text: Allows a conversion crucible to be overdrived by dropping a radiant essence to increase the radius of it
pages.title: Overdrived Conversion

pages.text: Tints uncolored armor to purple, when in soda,(Compatible with modded armor)
pages.title: Purple Leathered

pages.text: Adds interactibility with frostmint items, in item and spear form
pages.title: Amplified Frostmint

pages.text:
Dropped Frostmint items will explode similar to falling frostmint 
Frostmint Spears when in collision will solidify nearby liquids
